title: (x) Intersect West '08 geometric sans - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Eric Hague}
content:
We’re trying to rework a logo, and not sure if this text is a geometric sans we don’t know or heavily modified/custom type. Sorry for the nasty image quality.

author: James Puckett
